allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(prompts\): create 5-prompt suite for companies house api integration

Add complete prompt suite for building Companies House API integration:

- 01-requirements-gathering.md: Requirements discovery via API analysis
- 02-architecture-design.md: Layered architecture with 7 ADRs
- 03-implementation-planning.md: 11-task TDD breakdown with dependencies
- 04-tdd-implementation.md: Implementation with context compaction survival
- 05-comprehensive-testing.md: Testing and quality verification

All prompts follow Anthropic XML prompting guidelines and enforce:
- STD-001 prompt creation rubric patterns
- STD-003 Java Spring Boot development standards
- Test-Driven Development discipline
- Measurable quality gates \(80%+ coverage target\)

Prompt 04 includes full context compaction survival with progress
tracking in .work/implementation/ enabling multi-session resumption.

Package: com.example.companieshouse
Build: Maven with application.yml configuration
Security: No hardcoded API keys, environment-based config

Total: ~105KB of comprehensive prompts creating production-ready
Spring Boot client library for company address lookup.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
